sentences.en: An automatic OFF circuit is designed according to the power system fault recoder and analyser.
sentences.cn: 针对电力系统故障录波装置设计了一套分析和远传自动开停机电路.

sentences.en: And also in analysis implies the analyser.
sentences.cn: 分析里还隐含了分析者.

sentences.en: Method: Determine the content of amino acid with automatic analyser.
sentences.cn: 方法: 用氨基酸自动分析法测定氨基酸含量.

sentences.en: Optical amplifiers - Test methods - Part 5 - 2 : Reflectance parameters; Electrical spectrum analyser method.
sentences.cn: 光学放大器.试验方法. 第 5-2 部分: 反射参数. 电频谱分析仪法.

sentences.en: Optical fibre amplifiers - Basic specification - Part 5 - 3 : test methods for reflectance parameters - Reflectance tolerance using an electrical spectrum analyser.
sentences.cn: 光纤放大器.基础规范.第 5-3 部分: 反射参数的试验方法.使用光电谱分析仪的反射公差试验法.
所以他就变成了分析者.

sentences.en: The analyser is housed in an explosion - proof enclosure.
sentences.cn: 分析器装在 防爆 壳体里.

sentences.en: The analyser is then reads out the results and plots them.
sentences.cn: 该分析仪,然后读出他们的成果和情节.

sentences.en: The analyser or sensing unit contains the sample - injection valve.
sentences.cn: 分析和传感单元内有注样阀.

sentences.en: The microcomputerized boiler - water analyser is an automatic instrument controled by microcomputer.
sentences.cn: 微计算机锅炉水质分析仪,是用微计算机控制的智能化全自动仪器.

sentences.en: The resultant image was assessed using a Quantimet image analyser.
sentences.cn: 所产生的图像由一台定量电视显微镜的图像分析器来加以分析.

sentences.en: The virus could attack the analysis by exhausting the patience of such an analyser.
sentences.cn: 病毒就可能通过消磨此类分析器的耐性来攻击该分析.

sentences.en: Thepowder is characterized by particle size analyser TG and DTA thermal analyser.
sentences.cn: 利用颗粒度分析仪、TG和DTA热分析仪等测定了氧化镁部分稳定氧化锆粉末的性能.

sentences.en: This is useful if the analyser is to be used in batch - type operations.
sentences.cn: 当分析仪用于间歇操作时这是用得着的.

sentences.en: This month BigChampagne, the main music - data analyser, is extending its monitoring service to pirated video, too.
sentences.cn: 本月, 音乐数据分析公司“大香槟”已经把检测服务拓展到盗版视频.

trans.tran_en: An analyser is a piece of equipment used to analyse the substances that are present in something such as a gas
